meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tentative.
meanings.sent1: Her tentativenesses in decision-making often led to missed opportunities.
meanings.sent2: I could sense the tentativenesses in his voice as he asked for my opinion.
meanings.sent3: The tentativenesses of the new employee made everyone chuckle during the team meeting.
meanings.sent4: The tentativenesses of the first-time speaker were like a delicate dance on stage.
meanings.sent5: The tentativenesses of the kitten exploring the room were endearing to watch.

meanings.definition: The act of being hesitant or uncertain.
meanings.sent1: The tentativenesses in her steps showed her lack of confidence in the dark hallway.
meanings.sent2: His tentativenesses in making a decision often caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The tentativenesses of the squirrel trying to steal a cookie were comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The tentativenesses of the driver navigating through the fog were like a slow-motion movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The tentativenesses of the student asking a question made the whole class hold their breath.
